Name: Building energy efficiency grade.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a building energy efficiency grade
Summary: This bill would update the ranges for energy efficiency grades.
RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}

\v0\par
\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows:\par
\par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\qj\cf1\ulnone\fs14    \fs24 Section 1. The definition of \ldblquote energy efficiency grade\rdblquote  in section 28-309.12.1 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as added by local law number 33 for the year 2018, is amended to read as follows:\cf0\par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\qj\cf1\b ENERGY EFFICIENCY GRADE\b0 . The term \ldblquote energy efficiency grade\rdblquote  means, for a covered building, a grade based on an energy efficiency score assigned through the benchmarking tool in accordance with this section as follows:\cf0\par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\li870\qj\cf1  \cf0\par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi-360\li720\qj\cf1 1.\tab If such score is equal to or greater than [90] \ul 85\ulnone  the energy efficiency grade shall be A;\cf0\par
\cf1  \cf0\par
\cf1 2\fs14 .\tab\fs24 If such score is equal to or greater than [50] \ul 70\ulnone  but less than [90] \ul 85\ulnone , the energy efficiency grade shall be B;\cf0\par
\cf1  \cf0\par
\cf1 3.\tab If such score is equal to or greater than [20] \ul 55\ulnone  but less than [50] \ul 70\ulnone , the energy efficiency grade shall be C;\cf0\par
\cf1  \cf0\par
\cf1 4.\tab\fs14  \fs24 If such score is less than [20] \ul 55\ulnone , the energy efficiency grade shall be D;\cf0\par
\cf1  \cf0\par
\cf1 5.\fs14  \tab\fs24 If the owner of such building has not complied with section 28-309.12.2, and such owner has had an opportunity to be heard with respect to such non-compliance, the energy efficiency grade shall be F; and\cf0\par
\par
\cf1 6.\tab If, in accordance with the rules of the department, it is not feasible to obtain an energy efficiency score for such building or if such building is subject to the exception in section 28-309.8, the energy efficiency grade shall be N.\par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi-360\li1590\qj\par
\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\qj\cf0\'a7 2. This local law takes effect immediately.\par
